title: UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH 2 Sys Celes
description:
Sys:Celes sinks towards ruination. For the Immortalize, the collapse of all that is, looms on the horizon. The curtain rises on the final chapter of the Hollow Night. Catastrophe beckons.Experience the Dramatic Stylish 2D Fighting Action in the latest entry of the UNDER NIGHT IN-BIRTH series 3 new characters join the battle: Moonlight Dancer “Twin Barrel Beauty” Kaguya, Indomitable Rampart “Steel Guardian” Tsurugi, and Endless Entity “Eternal Re-Birth” Kuon. TEKKEN 8
You won’t be able to take your eyes off the intense battles between these 24 fighters with the highly detailed HD pixel art graphics New to fighting games? Not a problem – simple inputs mean even beginners can pull off moves with a single button. All characters now boast new moves, such as Hyde’s Blaring Outrage and Linne’s Soaring Dragon .
The new game mechanics Creeping Edge and Celestial Vorpal open up additional depth to gameplay. May the tale of these countless Nights be concluded, on this eve, the moment of destiny. A long-awaited continuation to the tale of the Hollow Night unfolds
